articles.author: Adam Rittenberg
articles.title: Marshall opts out of bowl after coaching change - ESPN
articles.description: Louisiana Tech will replace Marshall as the opponent for Army in the Radiance Technologies Independence Bowl, it was announced Saturday.
articles.content:
Louisiana Tech will replace Marshall as the opponent for Army in the Radiance Technologies Independence Bowl, it was announced Saturday.

articles.title: Bird flu jumps from birds to human in Louisiana; patient hospitalized - Ars Technica
articles.description: This is the first human case of bird flu in Louisiana.

articles.title: Apple Plans To Refresh All Home-Based Products Next Year, Including The Apple TV And HomePod Mini, Featuring Custom Chips For Enhanced Communication - Wccftech
articles.description: Apple is expected to launch new Apple TV and HomePod mini next year with chip refresh for better data synchronization and more.
